Articles.Content:
Want to make some noise?

Check this.

If requested, I can create more.

Works in almost any version of KSP.

Download link.
Hahaha! I love the modding community for its crazy ideas!
Reminds me of an oooold Police Car I made in the SPH. If I get the need to I might re-create it using this, nice mod!
Very cool! Now we just need a General Lee...

Reading that thread title reminded me of this:

Truly Kerbal mind!
What mod did you use to get the lights?
Can you make a nuclear warning siren?
make a CBS live television crew

[quote name='hab136']Very cool! Now we just need a General Lee...[/QUOTE]

I have a 1969 Dodge Charger, unfortunately I can't get it to be fully orange. So it's black.

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Aviation Lights.

That's pretty easy to edit and put in.

That "nuclear alarm siren" is just a standard air raid siren. There's no special siren for nukes.

[video=youtube;erMO3m0oLvs]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=erMO3m0oLvs[/video]

For the nuclear siren, why not try the Federal Signal Thunderbolt 1000T? Shouldn't be too hard to model...

[video=youtube;kzFyGWdj6MI]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kzFyGWdj6MI[/video]

Go from about 1:53 for the attack signal
Can you add an air raid siren to this mod please? I would really like that.
